episodes.title: Aum Shinrikyo | Supreme Truth Cult
episodes.description: Today, I bring to you the story of the cult called Aum Shinrinkyo; its leader was a man named Asahara. He formed a new religion, gained thousands of followers and ultimately became a drugs, guns, and murder enterprise.
